search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for SocialPilot (socialpilot.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the direct URL to the official pricing page for SocialPilot: [https://www.socialpilot.co/pricing](https://www.socialpilot.co/pricing)【3:0†source】.
